item.title: Canvas Koala, Radial UI
item.description: Custom radial UI made in Godot for my WIP project Canvas Koala.

item.title: About
item.description:
I’m Jacob (feel free to call me Jakey), a UI/UX Designer with over seven years of full-time experience creating and designing experiences for web apps, mobile apps, and games!

This is my website to serve as a portfolio of creative work, both paid and personal.

Self-motivated and always learning, I welcome new challenges.

At University I studied Journalism and Arts, but when it comes to work, I feel like all the skills I’ve used and learnt are self-taught. I learn best by doing, and through doing I’ve learnt a lot about what I’m interested in and good at.

item.title: Untitled Platformer, Dialogue Test
item.description: Creating a dialogue manager tool for an untitled platformer game.

item.description: Coming up with some intitial concepts for Canvas Koalas titular Koala character.

itch.io/sumaburu

Solo project made from a love of local multiplayer and weird control schemes.

item.title: Mia, Wasteland Deliveries, 3D Character
item.description: A rigged 3D character for a friends project I modelled, textured, and rigged. Feel like I captured my original style for her.

item.title: Mia, Wasteland Deliveries, Concept Art
item.description: Concept art for a friends project I later did in 3D. The pink hair was a bit much for them, but I was keen to go for something a bit more abstract. Very inspired by Dragon Ball Bulma.

item.title: Halo Punk, Concept Art
item.description: Conceprt art for a punk kid who got sent to the afterlife and now has to work “odd” jobs to make his way back home.

item.title: Dada Jokes
item.description:
itch.io/dadajokes

48hr Global Game Jam 2024

Teammate and I did a rapid ideation process to find a concept we both liked, then split the tasks. I created art assets while my teammate coded. Later integrated UI and assets into Unity.

item.title: Go Go Big Mode
item.description:
itch.io/gogobigmode

Retro Sci-Fi Arcade Shooter

Solo-built third-person arcade shooter for Game Jam — retro sci-fi theme with custom icons for upgrade paths, crafted rapidly under tight deadline.

item.title: Kalimari
item.description:
itch.io/kalamari

Solo Godot Mobile and Browser Game

Solo project in Godot to learn the engine and publishing to Google Play. Now web version on itch.io after Android API updates hid the original package.
